languages.text: "Внимательнее слушайте {mf|его|ее}. Исполняйте свой долг. И, Трона ради, задавайте поменьше вопросов".

traits.locale_text: "Внимательнее слушайте его. Молитесь. И ради Императора, задавайте поменьше вопросов".

languages.text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."
languages.original_text: "Внимательнее слушайте {mf|его|ее}. Исполняйте свой долг. И, Трона ради, задавайте поменьше вопросов".

traits.locale_text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."
"Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."
"Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."
"Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."
"Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."

languages.text: 「あの方が話すときは注意深く聞け。義務を果たせ。そして、質問はしすぎるな」
languages.original_text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."

traits.locale_text: 「あの方が話すときは注意深く聞け。義務を果たせ。そして、質問はしすぎるな」

languages.text: "Hört aufmerksam zu, wenn {mf|er|sie} spricht. Erfüllt Eure Pflicht. Und beim Thron, stellt weniger Fragen."
languages.original_text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."

traits.locale_text: "Hört aufmerksam zu, wenn {mf|er|sie} spricht. Erfüllt Eure Pflicht. Und beim Thron, stellt weniger Fragen."

languages.text: "O konuştuğunda iyi dinle. Vazifeni yerine getir. Bir de Taht aşkına, daha az soru sor."
languages.original_text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."

traits.locale_text: "O konuştuğunda iyi dinle. Vazifeni yerine getir. Ve Taht aşkına, daha az soru sor."

languages.text: «Escuche atentamente sus palabras. Cumpla su deber. Y, por el Trono, deje de hacer preguntas».
languages.original_text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."

traits.locale_text: «Escuche atentamente sus palabras. Cumpla su deber. Y, por el Trono, deje de hacer preguntas».

languages.text: “{mf|他|她}开口的时候，你要认真听，履行好你的职责。还有，黄金王座在上，少问点问题吧。”
languages.original_text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."

traits.locale_text: “{mf|他|她}开口的时候，你要认真听，履行好你的职责。还有，黄金王座在上，少问点问题吧。”

languages.text: « Écoutez attentivement {mf|lorsqu'il|lorsqu'elle} prendra la parole. Faites votre devoir. Et, par le Trône, arrêtez de poser tant de questions. »
languages.original_text: "Listen attentively when {mf|he|she} speaks. Do your duty. And, for Throne's sake, ask fewer questions."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez attentivement {mf|lorsqu'il|lorsqu'elle} prendra la parole. Faites votre devoir. Et, par le Trône, arrêtez de poser tant de questions. »
